short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Copy all the links from your current browser tab.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The Tab Links Copier is a Chrome extension that allows you to easily copy the URLs of links on a web page. It provides a convenient way to collect and save links for further use.

=== Features ===
• Copy the URLs of links on the current web page.
• User-friendly popup interface with a "Copy Links" button.
• Provides feedback to the user on the copy operation.

=== Installation ===
1. Open Google Chrome.
2. Go to the Chrome Web Store.
3. Search for "Tab Links Copier" and click "Add to Chrome."
4. The extension icon will appear in the Chrome toolbar.

=== Usage ===
1. Install the extension from the Chrome Web Store or load it as an unpacked extension.
2. Browse to a webpage with links.
3. Click the extension icon in the Chrome toolbar to open the popup.
4. Click the "Copy Links" button to copy the links.

=== Support ===
For any questions, issues, or feedback, please contact us at extensions@mdmarufadnansami.com.

=== Donations ===
If you find this extension helpful and would like to support its development, consider making a donation at https://www.buymeacoffee.com/RealboyAdnan.
